entry.title: 如何使用github和hexo搭建个人博客
entry.content: 网上有很多关于github搭建个人博客的教程。但是本人小白一枚，希望自己把搭建过程重新记录一遍，算是对自己知识积累的一个过程。Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. 说明：你有一个github账号，进入官网https://github.com/ 开始搭建步骤11$ hexo new "My New Post" ``` More info: Deployment
